title: Capability Standards
description: Defines requirements for capability IDs, descriptions, and ownership.

rules.rationale: Provides a consistent regex pattern for AST-based linkage and tracking tools.
rules.statement: Source code linkers MUST use the form '# ID: <uuid>'.

params.instruction: Verify adherence to: Source code linkers MUST use the form '# ID: <uuid>'.

rules.rationale: Enables autonomous planners to accurately select capabilities for complex tasks.
rules.statement: Capability descriptions MUST be specific and non-placeholder.

params.instruction: Verify adherence to: Capability descriptions MUST be specific and non-placeholder.

rules.rationale: Prevents 'ghost capabilities' that degrade system reasoning and documentation quality.
rules.statement: Descriptions such as 'TBD' or 'N/A' are forbidden in capability metadata.

params.instruction: Verify adherence to: Descriptions such as 'TBD' or 'N/A' are forbidden in capability metadata.

rules.rationale: Establishes clear accountability for the lifecycle and correctness of specific logic blocks.
rules.statement: Active capabilities MUST have an assigned owner (agent or team).

params.instruction: Verify adherence to: Active capabilities MUST have an assigned owner (agent or team).
